topics.body:
Alright! I just tweaked a bit here and there and now I'm all set to make a Let's Play!

I got a facecam, the video of the game works, the sound of both systems are in sync and all I have to do now is add some frozen text and once I'm done with the recording, edit it a bit like those sudden appearance of captions and then I'm done!
